pageProps.content: # 0. Welcome ## Havoc Havoc is a modern, malleable post-exploitation command and control framework. It's free and [open source on github](https://github.com/HavocFramework/Havoc) written and maintained by [Paul Ungur (C5pider)](https://twitter.com/C5pider) Consider supporting this project by donating: * [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/5pider) * [Github Sponsors](https://github.com/sponsors/Cracked5pider/).
